name: Wacky Soldiers
description:
This action top-down shooting game will examine your reflexes!

Join us on Discord chat for news and updates!



  • Single player
  • Local multiplayer
  • Online multiplayer

Game modes:
  • Classic survival
  • Zombie survival
  • Deathmatch
  • Team Deathmatch
  • Capture the flag
  • Last man standing

Level maps:
  • Desert
  • Tropical Island
  • Medival Village
  • Ancient City
  • Christmas Village
  • Winter Plains
  • 8 bit Land
  • Wasteland
  • Warehouse
  • Moon
  • Mars
  • ... and many others ...
